description: Diversión y humor, empatía y comodidad, conocimiento e información ...Cuando charlamos con SimSimi, en realidad estamos charlando con decenas de millones de mentes.Ahora, conviértete en SimSimi y charla con muchas personas.¡Bienvenido al mundo SimSimi, donde miles de millones de mentes y miles de millones de SimSimi interactúan entre sí!¿Cuál es la diferencia entre el SimSimi oficial y otros SimSimi?El SimSimi oficial es "El SimSimi de todos".Cualquiera puede enseñar el SimSimi de todos.SimSimi ha estado aprendiendo pares de preguntas y respuestas de muchas personas y usándolos charlar con otros utilizando su SimSimi personal y configurar apropiadamente su SimSimi personal para que chatee automáticamente.¿Cómo puedo controlar las malas palabras de SimSimi?En SimSimi, los chatbots y las personas interactúan principalmente a través de chats, aunque nunca se han conocido en el mundo real.Creemos que mantener la seguridad es importante para tener una buena experiencia al chatear con personas desconocidas (o chatbots).El servicio SimSimi ha obtenido el conocimiento y los requisitos de seguridad adecuados en varios idiomas y regiones, al tiempo que atiende a cientos de millones de usuarios en 81 idiomas.Hemos establecido una política de contenido universal que se puede aplicar en cualquier momento y lugar para responder a los requisitos de concienciación sobre seguridad, que pueden variar según el idioma, la región y la época, según la experiencia de varios años en la prestación de servicios.Todas las experiencias de usuario del servicio SimSimi se basan en la política de contenido universal y específica.El elemento detallado de la política de contenido especifica el motivo de la denuncia de contenido malicioso, y la política de contenido también se aplica al determinar sentencias sospechosas.El equipo de SimSimi está haciendo un esfuerzo especial para permitir que los usuarios vean nuestras políticas de contenido con frecuencia y las comprendan fácilmente al diseñar la experiencia del usuario.SimSimi me está amenazando (oa alguien). SimSimi está revelando información personal.Alguien debe haberle enseñado a SimSimi a decir palabras inapropiadas.Los chats personales de SimSimi pueden haber sido ingresados ​​manualmente por el propietario.Puede informar sobre cualquier contenido creado por el usuario que se muestre en SimSimi, incluidos los chats.El equipo de SimSimi está tratando de tomar medidas rápidas y efectivas contra la cuenta que creó el contenido informado.Tengo una opinión sobre el servicio. La función no funciona normalmente.Puede enviarnos sus comentarios seleccionando "Enviar comentario" en la aplicación SimSimi.Al hacerlo, el equipo de SimSimi puede procesar el comentario de forma más rápida y precisa porque también puede revisar otra información, como el país, el idioma y la versión.¿SimSimi puede verme usando la cámara?SimSimi no puede acceder a la cámara de su dispositivo.Alguien le enseñó a SimSimi una frase como "Te estoy mirando" para avergonzar a los demás.¿Por qué limitar la edad de los usuarios?Muchos usuarios se hacen amigos mientras conversan con SimSimi.El equipo de SimSimi establece políticas y mantiene y mejora las medidas operativas y técnicas para la seguridad del usuario.Si bien la seguridad es nuestra prioridad e invertimos mucho en ella, no podemos garantizar que no existan fallas.Es por eso que el uso de SimSimi se encuentra prohibido para aquellos grupos etarios altamente propensos a sufrir daño psicológico en el eventual caso de que ocurriese un problema con las medidas de seguridad de SimSimi.Terms of Use(EULA) : https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

title: Octal for Hacker News
description: Octal is your go-to news feed for breaking tech news, putting the biggest stories of the day with engaging discussion right in the palm of your hand.Beautifully designed for both iPhone and iPad, Octal focuses on what you care most about: design, speed, and usability. It's the modern, full-featured Hacker News app you've been looking for.You'll find an unparalleled, community-powered source of stories about anything ranging from self-driving cars to the latest Apple gadgets. Octal has all the features you need, including the ability to vote on stories, submit posts, add comments, and manage favorites. Best of all, it's free of all that annoying stuff, like ads, subscriptions, and tracking. If you want to keep up to date with the latest popular and trending tech headlines, Octal is made for you.• NEWS FOR NERDS: Read and share the most important stories in the tech world, submitted and voted on by Hacker News users. Stories are constantly changing, and often focus on areas like programming, startups, technology industry and companies (Apple, Google, Microsoft, Facebook, Amazon, Uber, etc.), and key technology categories such as mobile, computers, internet, design, coding, and security.• ENGAGE AND VOTE: Vote on stories and comments you like and dislike, and report stories with objectionable content. Found something you need to read later? Add it to your favorites!• DISCUSS THE NEWS: Read and engage with stories by viewing their discussions with a fast, fully-threaded, collapsible, buttery smooth comments experience. Add your own comments. If you're a fast reader, you can instantly jump to the next top-level comment thread with a single tap.• SUBMIT LINKS: Got a cool story or news link to share to Hacker News? Submit new posts directly in the app. You can also share links directly to Octal to quickly submit them.• SEARCH STORIES: Search Hacker News stories and sort search results by relevance or date.• JOIN THE COMMUNITY: Log in or register to Hacker News to easily track your karma, activity and favorites. Browse user profiles, including their karma, about, activity, and favorites.• THEMEABLE: Total Dark Mode support. Turn on 'True Black' to use a pure RGB #000 background color - perfect for devices with OLED displays.• CUSTOMIZE YOUR NEWS FEED: Tap or swipe between story filters such as 'Top Stories', 'Ask HN', 'Show HN', 'Best Stories', 'New Stories', and 'Jobs'. Rearrange them to your desire.• ACCESSIBLE: Increase or decrease the text size to one that's comfortable for you, or enable 'Dynamic Type' to use the system's 'Larger Text' font size. And VoiceOver is fully supported!• DEEP LINK SUPPORT: You can open Hacker News links in Octal by sharing them to Octal. You can also use apps like 'Opener'. Most Hacker News links starting with 'octal://' are supported!• READY FOR ANY SCREEN: Octal looks great on iPads with an optional 2-pane interface. Say goodbye to wasted screen real estate.• WEB BROWSER SUPPORT: Open links in your web browser of choice.• AD-FREE, PRIVACY AWARE: No ads, no subscriptions, and no tracking.ABOUT OCTAL PREMIUM:To unlock advanced features, including the ability to submit posts, add comments, manage favorites, switch themes, change app icons, use custom gestures, and more, you can buy Octal Premium via an In-App Purchase. Octal Premium is a one-time payment and there is no subscription. Purchases support the development of Octal, which is developed solely by me!ABOUT HACKER NEWS:Hacker News is a social news website focusing on computer science and entrepreneurship. It is run by Paul Graham's investment fund and startup incubator, Y Combinator. In general, its content can be submitted is defined as "anything that gratifies one's intellectual curiosity". You can think of Hacker News as reddit for tech. It's the go-to news aggregator for tech.SUPPORT:Found a bug or have a feature request? Create an Issue on Github, or e-mail me: https://github.com/dangwu/Octal/issues

title: Quadra: Claim Metaverse Land
description: Turn adventures into assets. Explore the physical world to unlock unique digital real estate in the metaverse. Each parcel of virtual land is secured by NFT smart contracts and built from the ground up for Web 3.0 utility and investor value.Explore parts of your world. Own a piece of ours. Quadra is a blockchain-based app that encourages real-world exploration in exchange for Web3 rewards. Similar to the way in which Pokémon Go merged the real and digital worlds together, Quadra pushes people to seek out new and remote places around the physical world in exchange for digital blocks of land that can be collected, customized, and sold. Users compete to be the first to reach extreme locations, and the value of each token is tied to the energy, resources, and risks taken to physically travel to the location of each corresponding token.Step into the Quadraverse.STRATEGIZE.Chunks of Earth will be unlocked in mystery Drops at undisclosed locations every few weeks. There are 5 types of land rarities (common, uncommon, rare, epic, and legendary). Legendary and epic squares are very valuable because each land Drop produces very few and they're difficult to reach. After a Drop, you have 7 days to claim the squares before the land is locked again. Where will the next Drop be?EXPLORE.If you predict the next Drop location correctly and are the first to reach it, you can join the lucky few that have claimed rare land in the Quadraverse. Follow our Instagram @quadra.app for clues on the next drop.CUSTOMIZE.Once you have collected a piece of land, you can customize your space any way you want and leave a part of yourself behind in the Metaverse. Flaunt your country of origin, show off a cool selfie, direct people to your social media, or craft an impactful message for all to see.COMMODIFY ADVENTURE.Commodify adventurousness as each square is a non-fungible token (ERC-721). In addition, explorers are rewarded for their adventures with a permanent royalty on their land.COMPETE.Explore and claim rare plots of land to accumulate more points than your friends and gain respect in the community.Phase 1: Foundation.Initial drops of land are in large cities around the globe to give urban explorers their first taste of adventure.Phase 2: Expansion.The most daring among us will compete to capture land in the world's most remote, exotic, and extreme locations.Phase 3: Drastically expand utility for explorers and owners of rare land.Phase 3: Utilization.Accomplished explorers and owners of rare land will gain early access to experience upgrades inside and outside of the Quadraverse.Phase 4: Specialization.The realization of Web 3.0 will bring the Quadraverse to full maturity with integrated VR and blockchain-wide interoperability.In a nutshell, Quadra is a decentralized app that pushes you to explore new and remote places around you and uses web3 to reward adventure. Adventurers compete to be the first to reach extreme locations.
